column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My first tapas experience was at Ba Ba Reeba
column2: and it's been the best I've found in Chicago so far. I've made reservations every time I've gone
column3: and we've always gotten in a little early. If you plan on walking in
column5: be aware that the place is pretty consistently packed. On weekends
column6: you probably don't have a prayer to get in in under an hour. Waitstaff is quite friendly
column7: though the hostesses are sometimes a bit snooty
column8: and the place is always loud and boisterous without being too irritating.
